Module com.example.mydmsproject
Package com.example.mydmsproject.model

Class Sprite

java.lang.Object
com.example.mydmsproject.model.Sprite
Direct Known Subclasses:
Ball, Brick, Crack, Lightning, Paddle
public abstract class Sprite extends Object
An abstract parent model class providing basic functionalities such as image rendering and position setting for other game elements.
Author:
Tianxiang Song

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Sprite()
    Default class constructor, set X, Y position and speed to zero.
